string.value: You may have lost, then found your #t1902017#, but you wish to raise it in a healthy environment. What should you do? You'd better head over to #b#m914030000##k of #b#m140000000##k and see #b#p1202008##k.

#p1202008# was angry to see that one of his kids was not raised with respect and gave you a tongue-lashing. He then ordered you to make another #t4032334#...\r\n\r\n#i4032334# #t4032334# #b#c4032334# / 1#k
You made another #t4032334# and with that,you were able to raise #t1902017# into an adult wolf. You promise to never, ever lose your wolf again.

I had always thought you were a decent enough person to take care of our baby…but I guess I was wrong. Why did our baby shrink? Did you hurt his feelings? I cannot let this go on any longer. I cannot let a negligent person provide the love our baby needs to grow!\n#b#L0#(You emphatically state that you still want to raise the wolf and will do better in the future.)#l\n#k
…Are you really repenting for your mistakes? Humans are foolish…but your sincere attitude is what makes me want to give you a second chance.
Make the #b#t4032334##k again, the one that's required to restore the kid. That, and only that, will give me the heart to forgive you.
Are you not repenting, you foolish human? If you do not ask for forgiveness, then we'll take back the kid!
Did you bring the #t4032334#? Okay, let's give it to our baby.
Do not ever hurt Ryko's feelings again. You have already promised to be Ryko's partner for life.
Make some #b#t4032334##k and bring it here with the kid. You've made it before, so I am sure you will have an easy time making another one.
